dcterms:description: nuScenes is a multi-modal dataset designed for autonomous driving, providing a comprehensive set of sensor data including LiDAR and camera images, along with annotations for various objects in urban driving scenarios.
dcterms:title: nuScenes

dcterms:description: CARLA is an open urban driving simulator that provides a flexible platform for testing and developing autonomous driving systems in various urban scenarios.
dcterms:title: CARLA

dcterms:description: The nuScenes validation set is a subset of the nuScenes dataset used for evaluating the performance of perception algorithms in simulated environments.
dcterms:title: nuScenes validation set
